Part Two - Performance
Learn about VNAV performance entries and how they affect the flight plan in Part Two of this multi-part series... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Aug2018/VNAV2Aug18]]>
FANS Data Link Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Aug2018/A056Aug18]]> Federal Aviation Administration Change to LOA A056 Application
With the implementation of Advisory Circular 90-117 for data link communications, all US-based operators were required to re-apply for their existing A056 LOA/ Operations Specification by September 30th, 2018...
